# handler

**Instance Property**

The handler block to execute when the user selects the action.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var handler: UIContextualAction.Handler { get }
```

## Getting the configuration details

- **UIContextualAction.Handler**: The handler block to call in response to the selection of an action.
- **style**: The style that applies to the action button.
- **UIContextualAction.Style**: Constants indicating the style information that applies to the action button.
